jibe.sdk.client.simple.myprofile
Class MyProfileHelper

java.lang.Object
  jibe.sdk.client.simple.myprofile.MyProfileHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimpleApi
public class MyProfileHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimpleApi

High-level API class, used to retrieve the details of the user's profile See jibe.sdk.client.simple.myprofile for a code example.

Constructor Detail

MyProfileHelper

public MyProfileHelper(Context context,
                       SimpleApiStateListener simpleApiListener)
Constructor. This also starts the asynchronous initialization of the MyProfileHelper (establishing a connection to the background service).

Need to invoke dispose() before this class goes out of scope.

Parameters:
context - Context creating the MyProfileHelper.
simpleApiListener - SimpleApiStateListener which receives the callback regarding the initialization state of the MyProfileHelper

MyProfileHelper

public MyProfileHelper(Context context,
                       SimpleApiStateListener simpleApiListener,
                       MyProfileHelper.OnlineStateListener onlineStateListener)
Constructor. This also starts the asynchronous initialization of the MyProfileHelper (establishing a connection to the background service).

Need to invoke dispose() before this class goes out of scope.

Parameters:
context - Context creating the MyProfileHelper.
simpleApiListener - SimpleApiStateListener which receives the callback regarding the initialization state of the MyProfileHelper
onlineStateListener - callback interface for listening to changes in the online state of the connection the Jibe Cloud/Arena and the Jibe Network

getMsisdn

public java.lang.String getMsisdn()
                           throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                  JibeServiceException
Retrieves the MSISDN (international phone number e.g. +1 (234) 5678 9012). In most places, this is the country code followed by the local phone number without leading zero.

Returns:
The MSISDN associated with this profile.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the MyProfileHelper is not initialized yet or has already been disposed.
JibeServiceException - if there is a problem communication with the Jibe Realtime Engine (an Android background service)

startMonitoringOnlineState

public void startMonitoringOnlineState()
                                throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                       JibeServiceException
Starts listening for updates to the online state of the connection. Updates are received via the jibe.sdk.client.simple.profile.MyProfileHelperListener

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the MyProfileHelper is not initialized yet or has already been disposed.
JibeServiceException - if there is a problem communication with the Jibe Realtime Engine (an Android background service)

stopMonitoringOnlineState

public void stopMonitoringOnlineState()
                               throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                      JibeServiceException
Stops listening for updates to the online state of the connection. No more online state updates are received via the jibe.sdk.client.simple.profile.MyProfileHelperListener

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the MyProfileHelper is not initialized yet or has already been disposed.
JibeServiceException - if there is a problem communication with the Jibe Realtime Engine (an Android background service)

getCountryCode

public java.lang.String getCountryCode()
                                throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                       JibeServiceException
Gets the country code associated with this profile. The country code is in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

Returns:
The country code associated with this profile.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the MyProfileHelper is not initialized yet or has already been disposed.
JibeServiceException - if there is a problem communication with the Jibe Realtime Engine (an Android background service)
